info.description:
Alfred Wallet backend API文件


Header參數說明：

  • x-LANGUAGE: 使用語言，測試可以使用tw
  • x-TIMESTAMP: 時間戳
  • x-VERSION: 版本，測試用0.0.1
  • x-PLATFORM: 平台，測試可使用web
  • x-SIGNATURE: 為language+platform+timestamp做MD5加密後的簽名
  • x-TOKEN: 登入後得到的token

post.summary: 提幣/劃轉審核紀錄詳情

x-enum-comments.ActionAcceptTransferInvest2Wallet: Transfer invest to wallet 劃轉:  理財錢包 -> 一般錢包   一般錢包Server收到  處理
x-enum-comments.ActionAcceptTransferWallet2Invest: Transfer wallet to invest  劃轉:  一般錢包-> 理財錢包    理財錢包Server收到  處理
x-enum-comments.ActionInterestReward: Interest reward for sales   業務獎金
x-enum-comments.ActionPeriodicPurchaseCost: Periodic Purchase cost  定投費用
x-enum-comments.ActionPeriodicPurchaseReturn: Periodic Purchase  return  定投返還
x-enum-comments.ActionWithdrawInterest: Withdraw Interest  挖礦的提領利息

valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

mail.description: email  (unique_index) must be unique_index, not uniqueIndex
